title: Pls help asap :(
body: So my old computer screwed up and I was forced to use my brothers old one (still newer then my old one tho) but for some reason my FPS are so low. On my old PC I was getting around 40 ping / 60 fps but on this one I'm getting 20 ping / 11 fps.. Dreams of hitting gold this season are getting further and further. Please help a poor scrub :( thank you.

replies.body: Do you know any ways to improve FPS?

Other that removing all games / programs you don't use on the computer then no sorry :(. You can also try programmes that boosts your FPS by disableibg unnecessary background programmes ect (downloadable from Internet). Try raze game booster

Hey Dude!

Have you tried giving the old hard drive a thorough clean using programs such as cc cleaner? 

https://www.piriform.com/ccleaner

Give that a run through and should get rid of files that are eating your RAM for breakfast. I highly recommend using cc cleaner on a regular basis to keep your HD nice and tidy :) 

Otherwise, check what processes are running in the background of your PC (Ctrl+Alt+Delete) and see if you can end ones that are chewing through your memory.

EDIT: Also, forgot the classic - defrag your hard drive, you will be surprised at how great this and cc cleaner improve your PC performance if it's old & messy.
